chart_description: This chart displays the percentage of cache hits in the open cache of the Netdata database engine. The open cache stores metadata about all the metrics Netdata collects. A high cache hit ratio indicates that most metadata queries are served from the cache, resulting in faster query responses.

dimension_descriptions.closest: The time, in seconds, of the closest available data point to the current moment.
dimension_descriptions.exact: The exact time, in seconds, the metadata for the metrics was last cached.
